department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Atlantic Region, on behalf of various government departments, has a requirement for a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery and offloading of various quantities of Boxed Lunches on an 'as and when requested basis' for the period of the Standing Offer.
full_summary:
### First Period EC095-230009: Regional Master Standing Offer for Boxed Lunches #

#### Solicitation Number and Reference

*   Solicitation Number: WS3866453681
*   Reference Number: WS3866453681-3899041030

#### Tender Details

*   Title (English/French): 1st Period EC095-230009 RMSO Boxed Lunches
    / 1ère période EC095-230009 OCPR Casserole en boîte

#### Publication and Closing Dates

*   Publication Date: 2023-03-06
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-20 14:00:00 (local time)

#### Expected Contract Dates

*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-04-01
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

#### Procurement and Contracting Information

*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Bid

#### Contracting Entity and Government Department

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   User Department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Technical Specifications and Requirements

Supply, delivery, and offloading of various quantities of Boxed Lunches on an as-and-when basis for the Atlantic Region. The Standing Offer can be called upon by more than one government department.

#### Regional Service Area

The Standing Offer is required in the regions of New Brunswick, Newfoundland, and Labrador, and Nova Scotia.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   Name: MacFarlane, Andrew (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15487240?extsite=MTU0ODcyNDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==


Please do not add irrelevant information, or remove existing information unless absolutely necessary. 

Write the output in Markdown format.

You have 400 words or less to write. 

Use the correct Canadian federal government agencies and terminology. 

Use proper punctuation, formatting and grammar. 

Do not make up information, stick to the details in the original text.

Let me know if there are any issues.  Azrael
